original_text: Then bring Aaron and his sons to the entrance of the Tent of Meeting. Use water to wash them there and make them clean.
korean_text: 너는 아론과 그의 아들들을 회막 문으로 데려다가 물로 씻기고

sentences.original_text: Then bring Aaron and his sons
to the entrance of the Tent of Meeting
Use water to wash them there
